# {title} Try to find bandages in backpack, if found - use it with target to Self. N.B. Works ONLY with client version 5.0.4+
### DWS\Pascal Script: ```pascal procedure BandageSelf; ``` DWS\Pascal Script Example: ```pascal If HP < GetMaxHP div 2 then BandageSelf; ``` ### Python: ```python def BandageSelf() ```
